detailsData.title: Experienced Litigators
detailsData.content: True litigators who know when to negotiate a settlement and when to fight all the way to trial.

detailsData.title: Personalized Approach
detailsData.content: One-on-one relationship with clients, providing personal, passionate, and methodical representation.

detailsData.title: Family Legacy
detailsData.content: A father-son firm with two generations of legal expertise serving Riverside and surrounding areas.

valueProp: The Knez Law Group is a Riverside based civil litigation firm representing both plaintiffs and defendants in cases throughout California.

testimonalData.text: Fred and his team provided exceptional legal representation. I highly recommend their services.
